__e: Feel free to come and tell us about your projects, ask for our catalog, USB box, pressbook and applications at info@isamoss.eu
Applications should be submitted before Octobre 15 2018.
In total 2700 applications worldwide and here we are in the semi-finals! Only a few more days before we know if we managed to convince the juries.
Please send in your applications for 2014 by 13 September 2013.
Applications for attending the conference are open until May 26, 2019.
Thanks a lot to all of you who sent us a proposal! The jury is going to study all applications carefully and we will inform the participants about their decision in February.
If you are already registered in our application system and wish to have your data removed, please contact us at the below emails according to the region in which you reside:

Nominations sent to these addresses may be considered in a different category, as appropriate.
